```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(hexbin)
```

```{r}
ces <- read_csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() 
```

```{r}
# adding a new code chunk with a basic ggplot2 scatter plot graph 
ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white_percent, y = ces_3_0_score)) + geom_point() +
 geom_hex(
  mapping = NULL,
  data = NULL,
  stat = "binhex",
  na.rm = FALSE,
  show.legend = NA,
  inherit.aes = TRUE) +
  labs(x = "% white population in census tract", y = "CalEnviroScreen 3.0 Score") +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "coral1", high = "brown") + #added fill color gradient (cm)
  theme_minimal() # added theme minimal
```
